name: 3310 Adventure
description:
This game was developer for Nokia 3310 Jam 3. It has to follow the limitation of the legacy Nokia 3310 (84x48 pixel size, two colors and 1 channel monophonic sound/music). It was developed using Godot engine. It is a very short platformer, but I enjoyed working on it. I hope you will enjoy playing it. :)

The optional theme of the Jam was On/Off and I have interpreted the theme with the change of light between outside (where it is snowing) and inside the cave (the darkness is simulated with inverted colours).

Left/Right keys to move and space to jump.

It was tested with Chrome browser, it may not work on Safari browser.

Credits:

Sound and Fonts from Nokia 3310 Jam Resources page.
